author: Reuters
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that concerns over national security risks posed by Nippon Steel’s $14.9 billion bid for U.S.
title: Trump says national security concerns in Nippon-U.S. Steel deal can be resolved

author: Adam Reiss
description: A juror in the Sean “Diddy” Combs sex trafficking trial is expected to be dismissed from the case on Monday over inconsistencies about where he lives
title: A juror in the Sean 'Diddy' Combs sex-trafficking trial is expected to be dismissed

author: Lorie Konish, CNBC
description: House reconciliation legislation, also known as the One, Big, Beautiful Bill, includes changes aimed at helping to boost family’s finances
title: Who benefits from Republicans' 'big beautiful' bill depends largely on income. Children are no exception

author: The Associated Press
description: COLUMBIA, S.C. — A South Carolina man sent to death row twice for separate murders was put to death Friday by lethal injection in the state’s sixth execution in nine months
title: South Carolina executes man who was serving death sentences in two murders

author: Rob Wile
description: President Donald Trump continues to enjoy income streams from scores of luxury properties and business ventures, many of which are worth tens of millions of dollars, according to a financial disclosure form filed late Friday.
title: Trump made millions on guitars, bibles and watches with his name on them, disclosure reveals

author: Daniel Arkin
description: This is a free article for Diddy on Trial newsletter subscribers.
title: Kanye West appears at federal courthouse to support Diddy

author: Dennis Romero
description: At least 11 people are confirmed dead in late-spring flooding in San Antonio, and search efforts are still underway for an undetermined number, city officials said Friday
title: At least 11 confirmed dead in San Antonio flooding, with unknown number still missing

description: Iran has launched another wave of missiles toward Tel Aviv, with explosions seen on the ground despite Israel’s Iron Dome defense system intercepting many projectiles.
title: Fourth wave of Iranian missiles hits Tel Aviv amid rising tensions

author: Robert Frank, CNBC
description: A court battle over the late singer Jimmy Buffett’s $275 million estate has highlighted the growing litigation over the trillions of dollars in wealth being passed down to spouses and families, experts said
title: Battle over Jimmy Buffett's $275 million estate highlights risks of family trusts

author: Rohan Nadkarni
description: Between the Indiana Pacers in the NBA Finals and the Caitlin Clark-led Fever mania, local basketball fans are having the time of their lives.
title: Indiana has always had a special connection to basketball — and now it's the center of the hoops universe

author: The Politics Desk
description: President Donald Trump faces a political balancing act on the Israel-Iran conflict, with some in the MAGA base wanting to avoid another Middle East conflict.
title: Trump's balancing act on the Israel-Iran conflict: From the Politics Desk

author: Jiachuan Wu
description: Where Israel’s initial attacks landed, damaging Iran’s nuclear capabilities and targeting military leadership, scientists.
title: Map: Where Israel attacked Iran

author: Leslie Josephs, CNBC
description: Airlines around the world canceled flights to Israel and were skirting a large swath of airspace in the Middle East on Friday after Israel’s overnight missile strikes on Iran.
title: Airlines divert, suspend flights after Israel's strike on Iran closes airspace in Middle East

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: Podcast star Alex Cooper decided to speak out about being allegedly sexually harassed by her Boston University soccer coach because "there was no accountability, no investigation and no justice," and warned, "I'm coming for all of you."In Cooper’s docuseries, "Call Her Alex," which released on Hulu this week, she alleged her college soccer coach, Nancy Feldman, sexually harassed her. In a new statement on Instagram Thursday, Cooper said the harassment lasted for three years while she was a stu
title: Alex Cooper says she's 'coming for' people who allowed alleged harassment by Boston coach

author: Jonathan Allen
description: Israel's latest action pits traditional Republican support for Israel — and antipathy toward Iran — against the MAGA base's fear that the U.S. will be drawn into a new foreign war.
title: Israel-Iran conflict splits Trump's MAGA backers

description: NBC News' military analyst Lt. Gen. Stephen Twitty says Iran's latest attack on Israel does not appear to be "overly complicated," using mainly ballistic missiles and possibly drones that are being largely intercepted by air defenses.
title: Iran's latest missile attack on Israel 'one dimensional,' military analyst says

author: The Associated Press
description: Caitlin Clark ended practice Friday by making a half-court shot and winning a little bit of lunch money in the process.
title: Caitlin Clark to return to the Indiana Fever after missing last five games

author: Jeff Cox, CNBC
description: Consumers in the early part of June took a considerably less pessimistic view about the economy and potential surges in inflation as progress appeared possible in the global trade war, according to a University of Michigan survey Friday
title: Consumer sentiment reading rebounds to much higher level than expected as people get over tariff shock

author: Kimmy Yam
description: The Trump administration does not plan on releasing pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil despite a federal judge’s ruling this week that he cannot be deported or detained based on a determination from Secretary of State Marco Rubio that he is a threat to national security.
title: Government says it won't release Mahmoud Khalil despite judge's order

description: Watch as Iranian missiles are intercepted by the Iron Dome above Tel Aviv and an explosion after something appears to strike the city.
title: Watch: Iranian missiles are intercepted above Tel Aviv

author: Alexander Smith
description: Iran has no choice but to retaliate against Israel’s sweeping strikes on its nuclear facilities and targeted killings of senior officials, experts of the region said.
title: How Israel's Iran strikes might open 'Pandora's box' for the region — and the U.S.

author: Gina Vivinetto, TODAY
description: Meredith Gaudreau, the widow of NHL star Johnny Gaudreau, has penned a heartbreaking essay for Player’s Tribune that details the devastating moment she learned her husband died
title: NHL star Johnny Gaudreau's widow details how she found out he died

author: Liz Calvario, TODAY
description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce stepped out for a hockey-filled date night
title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have date night at Game 4 of the Stanley Cup Final

author: Liz Calvario, TODAY
description: When Celine Song wrote the script for her debut feature film, “Past Lives,” she was inspired by a conversation she had at a New York bar with her husband and her childhood sweetheart, who was visiting from South Korea
title: Celine Song's secret to making heartbreaking rom-coms is her personal life

author: Chris Jose, NBC New York
description: Four people detained at an immigration detention center in New Jersey have gone missing, according to two senior officials
title: Four detainees at Newark ICE facility are missing, senior officials say

author: Reuters
description: Trump failed to persuade a federal appeals court to reconsider the $5 million verdict won by E. Jean Carroll after a jury found he sexually abused and defamed the former magazine columnist in the 1990s.
title: Federal appeals court won't reconsider Trump's $5 million loss to E. Jean Carroll

author: Matt Lavietes
description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia, the Maryland resident who was erroneously sent to a prison in El Salvador and returned to the United States last week, pleaded not guilty on Friday to human smuggling charges
title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia pleads not guilty to human smuggling charges

author: Viola Flowers
description: Former NFL wide receiver Antonio Brown is wanted on an attempted murder charge in Miami, according to an arrest warrant.
title: Former NFL star Antonio Brown wanted on attempted murder charge in Miami

description: Hundreds have been arrested or detained in several cities this week at protests over the Trump administration’s immigration raids.
title: Weekend of ICE protests planned nationwide, with troops deployed in L.A. and Texas

author: Drew Weisholtz, TODAY
description: The Schwartz will be with us again
title: The Schwartz re-awakens: Mel Brooks announces 'Spaceballs' sequel

author: Marlene Lenthang
description: The survivor of the Air India Flight 171 crash Thursday revealed he miraculously survived by escaping through a broken emergency exit
title: The extraordinary escape of the lone surviving passenger of the Air India crash

description: The sole survivor of the Air India plane crash said that he climbed out of a broken emergency exit after the aircraft hit a medical college hostel in the city of Ahmedabad, killing more than 240 people. Speaking from his hospital bed, Ramesh Viswashkumar described the harrowing seconds before the crash and the moment he realized he was alive.
title: ‘I thought I was going to die:’ Air India survivor recalls harrowing crash

author: Shiv Sudhakar, M.D.
description: Complications from a Covid infection can harm the heart, brain, lungs and kidneys.
title: Covid study shows another reason to get vaccinated: Protecting the kidneys

author: The Associated Press
description: Antonio Espaillat and Maribel Espaillat have not been charged in the case, although authorities have 48 hours to present any charges before a judge.
title: Owner of collapsed Dominican Republic club that killed 236 is arrested, along with his sister

author: Rob Wile
description: Oil prices surged and stocks tumbled Friday in the wake of Israel's strikes on Iran's top military officials and nuclear sites
title: Oil prices surge, stocks tumble in the wake of Israel's strikes on Iran

description: Video aired on Iranian state media appears to show explosions at the Natanz nuclear facility as Israel launches a series of strikes across the country. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel targeted the site, which is Iran’s main nuclear enrichment facility, in a “preemptive strike.”
title: Video shows moment Iran nuclear facility hit by Israeli strikes

description: As preparations continue for President Donald Trump’s military parade in Washington, D.C., which honors the Army’s 250th anniversary and falls on the president's 79th birthday, several groups are organizing protests across the country, including one called No Kings which denounces what they call “corruption in government.” NBC’s Gabe Gutierrez reports for TODAY.
title: ‘No Kings’ Protests Planned Ahead of Trump’s Military Parade

description: As immigration protests roll on and legal battles erupt over President Donald Trump’s decision to deploy troops to Los Angeles, Democratic Sen. Alex Padilla was forced to the ground and handcuffed inside a federal building after attempting to question Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem during a press conference. NBC’s Liz Kreutz reports for TODAY.
title: Sen. Alex Padilla Forcibly Removed From Noem Press Conference

description: In a new video, a passenger who is believed to be the lone survivor of the Air India crash, and was seated at an exit row window seat, is seen walking away from the disaster. The man later spoke to a local broadcaster from his hospital bed. “I can’t explain. It’s a miracle,” he says. NBC’s Tom Costello reports for TODAY.
title: Lone Survivor of Air India Crash Speaks Out: 'It's A Miracle'

author: The Associated Press
description: Brewers pitcher Jacob Misiorowski insisted he didn't realize he had a no-hitter going when the 23-year-old flamethrower took the mound for the sixth inning of his dazzling major league debut.
title: Brewers pitcher leaves game with an injury while throwing a no-hitter in MLB debut

description: Three special agents are set to take the stand next. Yesterday, Combs' ex-girlfriend, "Jane," wrapped up 6 days of emotional testimony.
title: Sean Combs' lawyers seek to bar testimony about guns, says it's a ‘divisive issue' for jury

author: Elizabeth Robinson
description: Israel targeted Iran’s nuclear sites in an attack escalating the conflict between the two countries.
title: Israel and Iran's airstrikes and National Guard deployment rulings: Morning Rundown

author: Natasha Korecki
description: Democratic momentum comes after months of intra-party squabbling and an inability to find a coherent post-election message.
title: Democrats make a mark in their rowdy pushback to Trump

author: Alexandra Marquez
description: President Donald Trump on Saturday is set to host a major military parade in Washington, celebrating the Army’s 250th anniversary and Flag Day.
title: Trump's birthday military parade will cost tens of millions and feature thousands of soldiers

description: A residential building in Tehran was damaged after Israel attacked Iran’s capital in strikes that targeted the country’s nuclear program. Multiple sites around the country were hit with top Iranian military officials and scientists believed to have been killed.
title: Residential building damaged in Israeli attack on Tehran

author: Dan De Luce
description: Israel was able to carry out extensive air raids inside Iran even though it had virtually no element of surprise in its favor, driving home Israel’s vast military superiority over its adversary and Tehran’s security vulnerabilities
title: Israel's strikes highlight its military superiority over Iran, experts say

author: The Associated Press
description: Leon Draisaitl scored in overtime for the fourth time this playoffs, and the Edmonton Oilers beat the Florida Panthers 5-4 in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup Final.
title: Leon Draisaitl scores in OT again, Oilers beat Panthers 5-4 in Game 4 to tie Stanley Cup Final

description: Cigarettes and on-screen smoking are resurfacing in popular media. NBC News' Steven Romo explains the resurgence and the warning from medical experts.
title: Smoking makes a comeback in pop culture, doctors warn

description: Hossein Salami, the commander in chief of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, was killed in the Israeli strikes, according to Iranian state media. This comes as Israel said its strikes were focused on nuclear programs and scientists.
title: Iranian state media: Commander of Islamic Revolutionary Guard killed in Israel strikes

description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom slammed Trump during a press conference saying he is not a "king or monarch and should not act like one." The conference was in response to a federal judge blocking the Trump administrations order to deploy the National Guard to the state.
title: Newsom says Trump is not a 'king or monarch' after judge's National Guard order

author: Gary Grumbach
description: A judge temporarily halted the Trump administration’s National Guard deployment in Los Angeles, writing Thursday that the federal government did not have the authority to nationalize California’s National Guard.U.S.
title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump administration from deploying National Guard troops in L.A.

description: Israel is bracing for a potential retaliatory attack from Iran after it sent a wave of strikes to the country. NBC News' Courtney Kube has more on the potential retaliation and on the possible intention behind Israel's strikes.
title: Israel braces for potential retaliatory attack from Iran after strikes

description: Sen. Alex Padilla, D-Calif., sat down with NBC News’ Jacob Soboroff and disputed the White House’s account of the events surrounding his forcible removal from a news conference held by Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem in Los Angeles.
title: Extended interview: Sen. Padilla shares new details about his forced removal in handcuffs

description: The strike comes after the Trump administration had been in talks with Tehran on a possible nuclear deal and argued against such a step.
title: Israel declares state of emergency after confirming Iran strikes

author: The Associated Press
description: A Phoenix jury in Phoenix has convicted Lori Vallow Daybell of conspiring to kill her niece’s ex-husband in 2019, marking her second murder conspiracy conviction in Arizona in less than two months.
title: Lori Vallow Daybell is convicted in her second murder conspiracy case in Arizona
